string.name: splash_text
string.font: This app finds and displays default signal strength information from Bluetooth, Cellular, Wifi networks. \nBehind the scenes network settings are accessed and altered -
therefore only use this app at your own risk and after understanding app notes below. \n
\n- Bluetooth is turned on for scanning and turned off afterwards.
This app can therefore disconnect Bluetooth devices;
\n-Cell networks are only found for your carrier; airplane mode needs to be off for discovery. \n-Wifi is turned on for scanning.
THIS CAN INTERRUPT WIFI ACTIVITIES DURING TIME OF USE.
\n-This app only finds signals your phone has the ability to connect to \n-This app only works on "newer" phones.

-This app is for entertainment only; results are not valid. 
-This app does not collect any data. 
-This app needs networking and location permissions to get signal strength information.
